for_sales.sales_text:
Isadora comes with 2 sets of refurbished sails, (1 tan,. 1 white) and a Mariner 3.3 outboard engine in excellent, low use, condition. All running and standing rigging.

Isadora is most of the way through a full refurbishment, but still has some work remaining. The steep keel band needs repairing or replacing. The bronze and steel fittings need refitting as do the forward and centre seat planks.

Outer and inner hull have been stripped of spurious paints, applies and etched and two pack epoxy applied, 4 coat interior in fisherman green, hull 4 coats heavy black epoxy and pollished.

More details from M J Lewis

boat.full_description: After being laid up by previous owners Isadora sat with water in her, and required a degree of tlc when bought in 2001. She has 2 suits of sails. One set tan, and newer set white.
boat.name: Isadora
boat.short_description: Isadora is a lovely open day boat.
